fields.title: Enforcing accountability into the Gymkhana
fields.description:
As of now, there is no visible check on the works of the gymkhana which implies that
once elected, the students are oblivious to the work of their elected representatives.

fields.title: Peer Assisted Learning Program
fields.description:
Having worked with the PAL program from inception, I aim to incorporate this in more
courses throughout the campus

fields.title: Information for Bus Stands
fields.description:
Internal Bus Timings are not known very well to all the students of the campus. I propose
to set up boards near pick up locations on the campus which mention the bus timings and frequency.

fields.title: Students Wellbeing Group
fields.description:
The current gymkhana has worked to conceptualize the Students' Wellbeing group which
holistically engages all the campus residents. Identifying students who are in need of mental help is a
moral responsibility each one of us has.

fields.title: Explaining rules and regulations to the Incoming Gymkhana
fields.description:
Most of the newly elected representatives do not have a very clear idea about the rules and
the exact procedure to get work done, especially those related to paper work.

fields.title: Convocations on Campus
fields.description:
The current situation of convocations on campus presents many problems.
Problems are faced by both students and guests (parents of students). Many students,
post graduate would have not completed their masters' thesis or their PhD. Defence. Waitingfor a long time to get their degree is an actual concern. Also, many guests do not get the
chance to see their wards graduate due to the lack of seating availability.

fields.title: Contemporary Classes
fields.description: The campus junta need to broaden their experiences in eccentric cultural tastes.

fields.title:
Increase and Publicise Funds for B.Tech student attending
Conferences/Competitions.
fields.description:
The present STAF fund for campus students is not satisfying the applicant to
acceptance ratio. There is a need to increase in the staff fund

fields.title: Career Counselling
fields.description:
Students at the institute have great aspirations for their careers. But they also have many
questions and queries that have to be answered.

fields.title: Semester Exchange Programs
fields.description: To increase semester exchange programs and help students in getting through them.

fields.title: Discussion Areas
fields.description:
Currently, there is a need for a place in campus where students can actually meet, discuss,
ideate and collaborate. Although there have been certain attempts at that nothing concrete is in place.
I propose to create more such discussion areas.In various places across campus starting with one on
second floor of new sac. Ensure that New SAC has a collection of novels and non-academic books or
kindles so that people who can read, discuss and ideate over a cup of coffee.

fields.title: Inclusion of Performing Arts for 2 nd year students
fields.description:
Many students take Performing Arts as a part of their SA course in 1 st year. They should
be provided an opportunity to continue what they were learning in 1 st year if they are interested.

fields.title: Repository of profiles of Research Scholar Students
fields.description:
I propose to initiate and maintain a repository of the profiles of Research S students in the
form of web pages, containing their information especially pertaining to research

fields.title: Taking up additional credit courses
fields.description:
Taking up additional credit courses should be an option for all students irrespective of
their current CPI.

fields.title: Awards during Graduation Ceremony
fields.description:
Awards or medals should be given to students for the following categories.
1) Best Undergraduate Research Project Award from each department.
2) Best Postgraduate Research Project Award from each department.
3) Best Thesis award for PhD students from each department.
4) Best Sportsperson of the Year Award.

fields.title: Storage of Maintenance Equipment within Hostels.
fields.description:
It so happens that once our complaint is lodged with the maintenance cell, a representative
comes and evaluates the problem. Afterwards, he/she again goes back to get the suitable equipment.
But most often the issues which come up are related to lights, fans and the like

fields.title: Waste disposal from mess kitchens
fields.description: Dustbin bags should be used for kitchen waste disposal

fields.title: Hot Water Provision in Showers.
fields.description:
The old hostels do not have hot water connected to the bathrooms. Serious injuries can be
possible if somebody slips on the floor

fields.title: Renovation of Facilities in old hostels
fields.description:
It's been more than 10 years since most of the old hostels have been constructed and most
of the facilities are not in working or unusable condition.

fields.title:
Auctioning of goods of students at hostel level (preferably graduating
Batch)
fields.description: To gain revenue for hostel fund by auctioning of goods.

fields.title: Regulating the speed of Vehicles on road
fields.description: Boards displaying speed limits on the road

fields.title: Drinking water in Conference Centre, Food Court and SAC
fields.description: Installing Water Purifiers and Coolers

fields.title: Sanitary Napkin Dispensing Machines
fields.description: Install sanitary pad dispensers at appropriate places in the campus.

fields.title: RFID for Club Rooms
fields.description:
By using RFID enabled electromagnetic locks for club room access, we can streamline
and ease the process of utilising the rooms in New SAC.

fields.title: Multipurpose Complex
fields.description: Setting up major in-demand consumer services closer to the hostels.

fields.title: Further establishment of Skating Club
fields.description:
Providing infrastructure and support to kickstart the establishment of Skating Club in our
Campu

fields.title: Student-Faculty interaction matches
fields.description: To increase interaction and communication between student and faculty communities.

fields.title: Renovation of Table Tennis Hall
fields.description: Students are currently carrying the TT table to the Badminton court as the TT Hall isdamaged. There is an immediate need for the improvement of such infrastructure.

fields.title: Campus Innovation and Creativity Center
fields.description: Ideation Room

fields.title: Participation of Girls in Technical Events
fields.description: Conducting technical workshops

fields.title: 4I Labs
fields.description: Room and funding to be given to projects

fields.title: Inter IIT Technical Meet
fields.description: Room and funding to be given to projects

fields.title: Improvement of Hospital Facilities
fields.description: Aim to improve the general hospital facilities

fields.title: Deforestation and Environmental Issues
fields.description:
IIT Guwahati is known as the most beautiful campus in the nation and it is our duty to
maintain the same. A holistic proposal for keeping a tab on deforestation activities on campus.

fields.title: Campus Vicinity
fields.description:
As an IIT, it is our moral responsibility to contributing in paying back to the society.
Propose to initiate and contribute more such activities.

fields.title: First Aid Kits in Hostel
fields.description:
Will Ensure availability of basic medical needs at the hostel security desk throughout the
Semester.

fields.title: Earthquake Safety
fields.description: Mock safety drills to be conducted.

fields.title: Hygeine Concerns with regards to stray animals on campus
fields.description:
Rehabilitation of stray animals in a safe manner to maintain the hygiene in the residential
Areas.

fields.title: Self Defence Classes for Women on Campus
fields.description:
Women Students of IIT Guwahati must be equipped to face a multitude of challenges. Women
Safety is of prime importance to our campus. I propose to initiate self-defence classes for women on campus
so that they are prepared.

fields.title: Provision for students to recycle their used papers
fields.description:
Students accumulate used papers and notebooks and they do not where to give them for
Recycle.

fields.title: Making campus more accessible for the specially abled persons
fields.description:
Infrastructure in our campus is well thought of, there are some important places which are
not accessible to physically challenged people like the food court, the auditorium stage and so on. I
will try to ensure that maximum of these areas are made accessible to everyone.

fields.title: Online platform for sharing experience of interns and placements
fields.description:
There is a need for junta to get awareness of the work during internship and after
Placements.

fields.title: Increasing the number of people getting placed from our campus
fields.description: Establishment of a placement office in another city

fields.title: Exchange Students and Cultures
fields.description:
Teaming up with welfare board, we would let the international exchange students learn more about
their rights and responsibilities in and around the campus. There will be sessions organised for the
international students to share their stories, their food and their culture with the students of IITG and
vice versa.

fields.title: Alumni Cards
fields.description:
The existing design of the alumni cards is such that anyone can print them i.e., there is a
lack of authenticity in our alumni cards.

fields.title: Ease of Budget allocation of SAIL
fields.description: There is a hindrance to the flow of budget with regard to SAIL.

fields.title: Feedback on shops in Academic Complex
fields.agendaCategory: Follow-Up on Initiatives started by current Gymkhana
fields.description: Replacement of loosely functioning outlets in the academic complex.

fields.title: Spectacles Shop
fields.agendaCategory: Follow-Up on Initiatives started by current Gymkhana
fields.description: Establishment of a spectacles shop in the market complex.

fields.title: Open Mic Sessions and Food Festivals
fields.agendaCategory: Follow-Up on Initiatives started by current Gymkhana
fields.description:
The need for conducting more events that inculcate out-of-the-box thinking and creative
visualization of junta should be recognized.

fields.title: IITG Internal Commuting
fields.agendaCategory: Follow-Up on Initiatives started by current Gymkhana
fields.description: More number of E Rickshaws shall be set up and charging stations shall be constructed.

fields.title: Souvenir Shop
fields.agendaCategory: Follow-Up on Initiatives started by current Gymkhana
fields.description: Establishment of a souvenir shop in library.

fields.title: Removal of ban on senior students on interaction with freshman
fields.description: Currently pertaining to threats related to harassment and security of freshman Photograph(first yearstudents), senior students cannot interact with them in hostel premises for the first three month. Althoughthis protects them, but the interaction is critically important for their growth and to inculcate a bond withtheir seniors.

fields.title: Use of Heavy Duty Washing Machines/ Centralized Laundry.
fields.description: Current Washing machines cannot withstand the amount of load that is forced ontothem for such a long duration of time and as a result, they easily are damaged.

fields.title: Imposing strict rules on Canteens and Juice Shops
fields.description: The prices put up on basic commodities such as fruits, eggs, milk etc...are not kept under check and hence the juice centers/canteens sell them at a higherprice. This has to stop. Further, there is no fine imposed on canteen and JuiceShops if the extend their leave without prior informing to the MMC. There is aneed of imposing tighter rules on them for better functionality.

fields.title: Market Complex/ local food shops in between hostels
fields.description: There is lot of unused spaces between hostels and most of it is inpathetic condition. It is the major reason of breeding of infectious diseases. Theseplaces should be used for creating local food shops or a Market Complex followedby open sitting arrangements. This results in open conversation amongst studentsof different hostels and increases social interaction.

fields.title: Monthly hostel inspection
fields.description: Food and water are two essential commodities that needs to be providedat the highest quality. Hence, there is need of monthly and surprise check of waterand food.

fields.title: Learn to play camps
fields.description:
The initiative aims to make sports facilities accessible to junta in a way that anyone who wishes to
learn any sport can learn it during their stay on campus.

fields.title: Reviving Sports Consumables Budget for hostels
fields.agendaCategory: Availability of Sports Goods for Junta
fields.description:
To develop the sports culture of the institute it is necessary for consumables to be available to the
junta at the hostel level.

fields.title: Sports Alumni Fund
fields.description:
Alumni funding is one of the most undeveloped part of IIT Guwahati and with the growing costs of
various facilities it has become extremely important.

fields.title: Extension of slots for all sports
fields.description:
A lot of students miss out on playing because time slots for junta are over by the time the get free
from their academic responsibilities especially PHD scholars

fields.title: Organizing of workshops on Fitness Activities like Zumba from professionals for Junta
fields.description:
Sports can act as a great stress buster for the junta, for this purpose I would like to organize
workshops on fitness activities like Zumba, aerobics.

fields.title: Sports Equipment Inventory for Junta
fields.agendaCategory: Availability of Sports Goods for Junta
fields.description: Quality Equipment are necessary for every sport and to best utilize our sports Infrastructure.

fields.title: Hall of Fame
fields.description: Installation of Hall of Fame for all sports in the Old Sac

fields.title: Formation of InterIIT Student’s Organizing Committee
fields.description:
InterIIT Sports meet is a huge event and on the occasion of Institute’s 25th Anniversary its successful
and grand organization is a matter of pride for the institute.

fields.title: Marketing of InterIIT Sports Meet
fields.description:
A lot of money from the Institute Budget would be hosting of InterIIT which could be used directly for
betterment of Junta

fields.title: Construction of new Squash Courts
fields.description:
Presently Institute has only one squash court therefore it becomes extremely difficult to incorporate
both InterIIT sessions, NSO and other players.

fields.title: Construction of Indoor Basketball and Volleyball Courts:
fields.description:
Basketball and Volleyball courts are severely affected by rains, this affects the InterIIT sessions and
also the other players in general

fields.title: Sports Goods Stock Website
fields.description:
Availability of sports goods is one of the major concerns for budding sports enthusiasts also sports
board purchases a lot of sports equipment each year and it is the right of junta to know where that equipment
being used.

fields.title: Conduction of Inter-Department Leagues
fields.description:
Inter-Departmental Leagues to be conducted to increase the involvement of PG students in sports
and also increase student faculty Interaction on campus.
Plan of Action: Coordinating with department through department wise associations, approval for necessary
budget for referees and refreshment for participants.

fields.title: Appointment of Coaches for IITG Contingent
fields.description:
Winning in InterIIT matches is important to everyone to ensure this it is necessary that IITG
contingent get the best training, which many teams lack presently.

fields.title: Special Diet for IITG Contingent After Spirit
fields.description: Proper nutrition of players is necessary for improvement of performance of institute in InterIITs.

fields.title: Organizing of Practice Matches for IITG Contingent
fields.description:
Experience of playing competitive matches by teams is necessary for improvement of performance of
institute in InterIITs.

fields.title: IIT Guwahati Contingent Website
fields.agendaCategory: Motivation and Appreciation on IITG Contingent
fields.description:
Performance of IITG Contingent is a matter of pride to everyone, but there is still need to increase
enthusiasm among students to become a part of IITG Contingent
Possible Solution: Building of a website to showcase the InterIIT Contingents of IIT Guwahati.

fields.title: Alumni Mentorship Program
fields.description:
Inculcating AMP to the main IITG portal, so that there is easy access to this program for students
and alumni mentors and they can access the portal as and when needed. Also, automating the total
Mentorship allotment system, with automatic email sending.

fields.title: AlumX Series
fields.description: Conduct a three-day lecture series by our most coveted alumni.

fields.title: Query Portal
fields.description: Opening up of a query portal for students for taking advice from alumni.

fields.title: Student Alumni Corporate Experience
fields.description:
A page on SAIL website, where alumni can post their ‘A Day in XYZ Company’ videos and blogs. Plus,
this will also hold various job and internship openings which can be posted by alumni.

fields.title: Faculty-Alumni Research Network (FARN):
fields.description:
The alumni can bring up the R&D projects of their respective firms to be solved by the IITG faculty and
Students.

fields.title: 25 th Anniversary IIT G Celebration
fields.description:
On the occasion of 25 th anniversary of IIT Guwahati, we plan to invite all the Alumni of IITG to
campus, and hold an event-cum-get together.

fields.title: Inter IIT Cultural evening
fields.description: An evening showcasing the culture of the north east.

fields.title: Manthan Cultural Extravaganza
fields.description: Showcase the best works of Manthan on a single day after Manthan

fields.title: Decoration of Sac
fields.description:
Display the paintings made by Fine Arts and photographs of montage in the sac to create a healthy
environment for cultural work

fields.title: Campus Outreach
fields.description: Conduction of competitions and interactions with Schoolkids in Akshara and KV schools.

fields.title: Student Faculty Interaction
fields.description:
Organisation of events to encourage interaction between students and faculty
Possible solution: covered in proposal
Plan of Action: Urge Lumiere and Anchorenza and RadioG to work on projects(short films, w

fields.title: Inter Club cooperation
fields.description:
Push clubs to utilise the full skillset of the members of the cultural board by proposing more
inter club project

fields.title: Club Core teams
fields.description:
Forming a team that represents the club to make clubs more approachable to freshers and sim-
plify overall management in every club

fields.title: Internships from the alumni of our institute
fields.description: An internship portal for students

fields.title: Academic and Emotional support to backloggers
fields.description: Involvement of counselors and TA’s to provide the same

fields.title: Bringing students up-to-date on the various competitive exams.
fields.description: Talks to be organized for students by seniors and alumni.

fields.title:
Availability of counselling to students who are too shy or nervous to approach
seniors or counselors.
fields.description: Anonymous counselling portal

fields.title: EQ101
fields.description: Building the emotional quotient and life skills of students

fields.title: Personal guidance for individuals
fields.description: formation of groups where each and every student can be given attention.

fields.title: Resource for students (Research Scholars etc.) who work post 2 am
fields.description: Availability of library and computer center for the same.

fields.title: Welfare through Social Service club
fields.description: Awareness in case of emergency

fields.title: Welfare through Youth Empowermen club
fields.description: Women Empowerment

fields.title: Welfare through Saathi  club
fields.description:
Students facing any kind of problems be it be academics, emotional or physical should be
taken care of.

fields.title: Hostel Affairs
fields.description: Proper engagement of Hostel’s welfare secretary in welfare board.

fields.title: Overall development
fields.description: Students are interested in various other domains also

fields.title: Agenda Heading: Generic Campus Welfar
fields.description: Coordinating with cab companies to provide consistent support during nights at reasonable rates

fields.title: Cleanliness in Main Audi, Mini Audi, Lecture halls and common sitting areas
fields.description: Sweeping the sitting areas at least every day. The auditoriums and lecture halls need a change in the seats or if not possible, cleaning them by the vacuum cleaner needs to be done at least a month.
fields.representativeComments: There is need of considering or increasing wages of all workers
fields.currentStatus: Cleanliness in Main Audi, Mini Audi, Lecture halls and common sitting areas

fields.title: Fogging should be done every month or once in two months to avoid mosquito breeding
fields.description: Fogging is essential specially during monsoon
fields.representativeComments: Done in various hostels and departments too
fields.currentStatus: Fogging should be done every month or once in two months to avoid mosquito breeding

fields.title: A prepaid card for mess
fields.description: Card swiping and eat
fields.representativeComments: Tried earlier too, leads mess contractor inccured huge losses

fields.title: More eateries in the campus at the subsidized rates
fields.description: tender will be releasing soon after meeting with establishment
fields.representativeComments: Needs meetings and tender framing for the same
fields.currentStatus: More eateries in the campus at the subsidized rates

fields.title: More funding for PhD students for various national and international conferences
fields.description: better oppurtunity to learn n great level of exposure
fields.currentStatus: More funding for PhD students for various national and international conferences

fields.title: Introduce a Pool Club
fields.description: Pool tables are common in most hostels now and there must be a common platform for the students to showcase their talent in pool.
fields.representativeComments: As the previous events manager of Sports Board, I say there is enough budget for a pool club to be introduced.
fields.currentStatus: To be introduced in Sports Board meeting.

fields.title: Animal Care Drive
fields.description: Most Hostels and the Academic area have plenty of animals around, these animals do not get proper care and might be infected with diseases.
fields.representativeComments: "Saathi club will help in undertaking Animal Care Drive"
fields.currentStatus: To be discussed in Saathi clubmeeting

fields.title: Introduce a Zero Hour in sports for beginners
fields.description: Student who has interest in a particular sport but due to unavoidable circumstances hasn’t been able to receive proper coaching in that particular sport.
fields.currentStatus: To be introduced in Sports Board meeting.

fields.title: TV in food court and New SAC area.
fields.description: CBS videos and videos or slideshows of pictures of different clubs aLong with the current events will be showcased

fields.title: cleaning and maintenance of area around the hockey field near Siang and Kapili
fields.description: The area around the mentioned hockey field is covered with wild bushes and attracts a lot of insects and mosquitoes. The messes of Kapili hostel and Siang hostel are nearby this area, making this a hygiene issue.
fields.representativeComments: "the area will be eventually cleaned as the 53rd inter IIT is  to be held at IIT Guwahati"

fields.title: A new cycle stand for Kapili
fields.description: Kapili hostel has inadequate space for cycle parking
fields.representativeComments: "For cycle stand to be introduced, the fence wall must be taken down and that we don't want to do"

fields.title: Smart card/RFID/biometrics to be used in mess
fields.description: Most students skip meals in mess for atleast 4-5 times in a month. A smart card will monitor the number of days a student has meals in the mess and will allow a refund of a particular number of days. And the MMC of respective hostel will now have proper stats which will be useful in the Long run.
fields.currentStatus: Electronics club is working on using RFID systems for multipurpose uses.

fields.title: Propose a solution for Optical Fiber breakdown
fields.description: Develop a new link of Optical Fiber from the damaged hostel to the hostel in which there is breakdown of Optical Fibre.
fields.representativeComments: Divert spare optical fiber of some other hostel to the hostel in which the optical fiber wire has been cut. Approach CC and figure out a solution for technical difficulties.

fields.title: Increasing participation in GBMS through HMCs
fields.description: Creating Awareness about the working of Student Gymkhana and increasing active participation from the student community in General Body Meetings.
fields.representativeComments: This would be done at the start of the next Semsester after the freshers induction programme.

fields.title: Foreign Exchange Programmes
fields.description: Collaboration with Student Academic Board to bring ample Foreign Exchange Opportunities to the Undergraduate Students

fields.title: Maintenance and improvement of Sports Facilities
fields.description: Renovation and Proper Usage of Sport Facilities keeping in view the Inter IIT Sports meet which would be organized by IIT Guwahati, later this year.
fields.representativeComments: The sports board is renovating the sports facilities for the inter iit to be organised in December.A proper plan for maintenance for upcoming future is to be drafted.

fields.title: Vehicle Tracking
fields.description: Incorporating Vehicle Tracking Technology into the Buses and Ambulances to reduce the various ambiguities associated with the Institute transport service.
fields.representativeComments: Being done by one of the Technical Board Club

fields.title: Finance Secretary
fields.description: Appointment of Finance Secretary for Every Board to specifically look into the financial matters of their respective boards
fields.currentStatus: To be discussed in the Finance Committee's meeting

fields.title: Minor Registration online
fields.description: Making Minor Course Registration Online.

fields.title: Increasing participation in GBMS through HMCs
fields.description: Creating Awareness about the working of Student Gymkhana and increasing active participation from the student community in General Body Meetings.
fields.representativeComments: This would be done at the start of the next Semsester after the freshers induction programme.

fields.title: Refilling unit for consumable gases/liquids
fields.description: To establish a gas/liquid refilling unit inside the campus

fields.title: Online portals
fields.description: To provide online portals for leave application, TA forms, no dues etc.

fields.title: Funding for conferences
fields.description: To provide funding for conferences abroad at least once in a PhD tenure and increase the current fund for national conference

fields.title: Engineering Section Moisquito Fogging at academic area
fields.description: Fogging, atleast twice in a month to provide a better working environment

fields.title: To enable students to Self - Issue books from the library.
fields.description:
Procurement and deployment of self-issue kiosks to enable uninterrupted issuing of
books using ID cards and removing dependence on office timings.
fields.representativeComments: This would not have been possible without our Librarian, and whole library staff, I thank them with humble heart.

fields.title: Cleaning of hostel boarders’ rooms per month
fields.description:
The hostel boarders’ rooms should be cleaned every month by the hostel
maintenance workers as per the choice of boarders.
fields.currentStatus: The basic framework is already done by the previous HAB, Will discuss about improvement in the senate meeting

fields.title: Appointment of certified nutritionist for mess.
fields.description:
Appointment of a certified Nutritionist with the following duties:
a. To ensure the quality of ration and vegetables which are bought from the market and keep a
check on hygiene.
b. To help the Mess management committees of all the hostels to decide a menu such that the
nutritional demands of the boarders are met, without compromising the taste of the food.
c. To introduce new recipes and train the cooks to make them.
fields.currentStatus: Have started buliding groundwork, and research related to the same
fields.unapprovedStatus: Have started buliding groundwork, and research related to the same

fields.title: Rejuvenation of hostel technical rooms to be equipped with better facilities.
fields.description:
Hostel technical room renovation and equipping the rooms with latest technical tools
and high performance computers with high utility software and increasing supplies of working
tools to help students with Video Conferencing, Kriti projects, BTP, Stimulations, etc.
fields.currentStatus: Surveying of all the hostels will start during July-Aug, expect a proposal by September

fields.title: Construction of an open air Amphitheatre.
fields.description:
action: The ideal location for construction is to be identified and a blueprint is to be
submitted to the admin for approval of the same. The features to be included are also to be
drafted and the construction be started by co-ordination of Engineering Section/Construction contractor.
fields.currentStatus: Solid groundowrk, research and talks need to be done for this work to be started and that too in proper direction. I expect to present this agenda during Oct-Nov

fields.title: To work for making the campus and services compatible to the differently abled.
fields.description:
action: I will coordinate with the establishment section to redraft the contract for
the Transport service providers to include the condition to construct ramps and install them
in the buses.

fields.title: CCTV in mess working area
fields.description:
Installation of CCTV cameras in the mess cooking area to ensure monitoring of proper
working practices and avoid hygiene and quality control.

fields.title: PhD degree certificates
fields.description: To provide degree certificates for PhD students multiple times in a year to facilitate admission in Post Doc and other future endeavours.

fields.title: Online portals
fields.description: To provide online portals for leave application, TA forms, no dues etc.

fields.title: Funding for conferences
fields.description: To provide funding for conferences abroad at least once in a PhD tenure

fields.title: Printing and scanning facilities in department
fields.description: To provide printing and scanning facilities 24*7 in the departments for research scholars at least

fields.title: Bus route and timings
fields.description: Bus route and timings need to be revised

fields.title: Canteen and juice centres in academic area
fields.description: The menu and quality of the food in the core canteens and juice centres need revision

fields.title: Feedback system
fields.description: Proper feedback to be launched for bus, canteens, food outlets, erickshaw service

fields.title: RO water purifier
fields.description: Proposal of centralized RO water purifier system for all hostels

fields.title: Gents and ladies beauty parlour
fields.description: Proposal for gents hair saloon and ladies beauty parlour at least in a hostel

fields.title: Sanitary pad vending machines
fields.description: Setting up of sanitary pad vending machines in girls hostel

fields.title: Extension in timings of sports facilities
fields.description: To propose extension of timings in sports facilities specially for PG students

fields.title: Juice centre in OLD SAC
fields.description: Juice centre in OLD SAC will benefit the players specially with inter IIT coming up

fields.title: Dermatologist in OPD
fields.description: I propose that hospital must have a dermatologist as many students in IITG suffer from skin related problems especially freshers as the climate in Assam is humid and many students cannot adapt to the new climate easily.

fields.title: Food for patients
fields.description: I also propose that patients admitted in the hospital must get proper food for their fast recovery.

fields.title: X-Ray machines , Plastering service
fields.description: Also, our hospital lacks some services like X-ray machine, plastering services and which I think are basic services in case of sports/general emergency.

fields.title: Solar led lights in campus
fields.description: I propose to replace all the street lights (many of which are not working) with more efficient and economical Solar Led Lights and I also propose to install more lights at various places like on road from Brahmaputra to KV and from New Sac to MS Hostel.

fields.title: More number of ERickshaws in the campus.
fields.description: I also propose that frequency of E-Rickshaws must be increased and at least 2 Rickshaws per 2-3 hostels must be present any time in case of emergency, for physically disabled people and I also propose that E-Rickshaw to the hospital in the medical emergency must be free to reduce the burden on Ambulances.

fields.title: Live tracking system for IITG Buses
fields.description: I also propose to install GPS system in Buses for live tracking of the same as many students miss the buses because of unavailability of the same.

fields.title: Collaboration with some cab service providers to provide cabs from campus to city especially airport at the discounted price.
fields.description: I also propose that our institute must collaborate with some car rentals to provide cab services from campus to Airport and vice versa at discounted prices as at present there are no buses to airport and also many times cabs are not present and some students miss their flight because of this, so this will help all the students going to airport.

fields.title: Ease in process of application, payment of transcript by making the process online
fields.description: I propose that transcript application process, fee payment should be made online aLong with the live status of the application.

fields.title: 24*7 internet facility at least a week before exams.
fields.description: I propose that 24*7 internet service should be started at least a week before midsem and endsem.

fields.title: Organizing get-together for people pursuing same interests like UPSC, GATE, GRE, CAT, TOEFL etc.
fields.description: I propose that get together should be organized for students pursuing same interests like UPSC, GRE etc. to create an environment in the campus for different streams other than engineering

fields.title: Extension in library book issue timings.
fields.description: Also that, timings for issuing books (which is currently till 5:30 P.M) should be extended because most of the students have classes/labs during that time and that books can be issued on holidays also.

fields.title: Introducing Kabaddi, Wrestling, Boxing, Martial arts in SA course.
fields.description: I propose to introduce sports like Kabaddi, Wrestling, Boxing and Martial Arts in SA courses as these sports are not only world-renowned but also prepare the individual for self-defense and IIT should give an opportunity to those students who want to learn or pursue their career in these sports.

fields.title: Permanent Coaches for SA, NSO courses.
fields.description: Permanent Coaches should be appointed for even better performance in events like Spirit, Inter IIT etc.

fields.title: Centralized washing machines in each hostel.
fields.description: I propose that a centralized washing machine system should be introduced in each hostel as washing machines in hostels are for domestic use and they are unable to bear such heavy uses.

fields.title: Project Proposal Portal (PPP)
fields.description:
Develop a portal for proposal and management of
projects.

fields.title: Discussion Area
fields.description: Common discussion area for all the students.

fields.title: 24x7 Availability of food in the campus
fields.description: Installation of snacks and tea/coffee vending machines across the campus.

fields.title: Health and Welfare.
fields.description: Organize free health checkup camps.

fields.title: Health and Welfare.
fields.description: Conduct Earthquake Mock Drills

fields.title: Health and Welfare.
fields.description: Installation of Jet spray in Toilets in Hospital.

fields.title: Competitive exam discussion forum.
fields.description: Set up and promote a discussion forum.

fields.title: Tedx talks
fields.description: Promotion for the conduction of Tedx talks.

fields.title: Maintenance of PCs in CC
fields.description: Increase number of working PCs in CC and to make sure that every PC has the same set of softwares.

fields.title: Street Light
fields.description: Street light maintenance and changing filament bulbs to LED.

fields.title: Ramp construction (Wheelchair)
fields.description: Construct ramps for differently abled people in hostels

fields.title: NSO
fields.description: Introduction of additional NSO programs for Chess.

fields.title: Blog series
fields.description: Initiation of a blog series for intern, placement and semester exchange describing procedure for application and experiences of final year students’ and alumni.

fields.title: Automatic mess bill calculation of HAB.
fields.description: Automation of mess bill including calculation and communicating on Students portal.
fields.representativeComments: SWC is working on this project, this being one of our major priorities.

fields.title: Automation of payment for various HAB utilities in the HAB portal like temporary room allocation, mess bill readjustments.
fields.description:
Adding a utility to existing HAB portal where the payment to and from HAB can be made
online.
fields.representativeComments: SWC is working on this project, this being one of our major priorities

fields.title:
Listing of all the committees and subcommittee and minutes of
their work under HAB and Gymkhana on their respective sites.
fields.description: 1. SWC will give facility to upload all the relevant contracts on their respective web portal. 2.SWC will give facility to upload the list of all committees and sub committees and their scope of work, meeting minutes and their work progress.

fields.title: New SWC website
fields.description:
1. To showcase work and activities of SWC.
2. To make SWC and its working more transparent to the general user.
3. To showcase the list of present and past associated members.
4. Experiences of the past internships will be showcased
5. Feedback from the IITG Junta to enhance the working of SWC.

fields.title:
Creating new website for the security section and helping in
automation of security
fields.description:
Security plays the key role in the life of IITG community and yet they do not get the
enough support and there is a no means of real time communication to them. Creation of a new website for security section and also help them using
technology at IITG gates.

fields.title:
Giving support to the campus community for the web
development and the hosting facility
fields.description:
Due to the lack of coordination between developers and the other stakeholders, they
have to outsource the web development and deployment task.

fields.title: Giving web support to the campus start-ups
fields.description:
During incubation period funding is the main issue, so they don’t have ample amount for
web development. On the other hand web is a very crucial for their expansion.

fields.title: Website for Inter IIT Sports Meet and Silver jubilee of IITG
fields.description:
As IITG will be hosting Inter IIT sports meet on its Silver Jubilee, will host a website for all
the events and updates.

fields.title: Listing the referential website for each of the IIT courses
fields.description:
1. For each of the running courses of IITG, Will take a survey of external website from the
campus students and alumnus.
2. Will rank the external website for each courses according to survey and an editorial
team.
3. Will display this list on SWC website.
4. Will also provide the mechanism to add the external link for a given courses or add the
feedback about the external resources.
5. In this way, this list will be dynamic and automatically updated.

fields.title: Automation of Sports Board
fields.description:
1. Online inventory of all the sports club on the website.
2. List and experiences of all the Inter IIT players.
3. Feedback of all the sportsman.
4. Gallery of all the achievements will be displayed on website.
5. Details of expenditure of Sports Board Budget will be displayed on its website for each
semester.

fields.title: Formation of new team for Campus Wiki
fields.agendaCategory: Reconstructing and expansion of SWC team
fields.description: Campus Wiki is a platform to showcase all the facilities and utilities of IIT Campus.

fields.title: Campus Information System team development
fields.agendaCategory: Reconstructing and expansion of SWC team
fields.description:
1. Will form a strong dedicated team.
2. Will create a local search engine on all the campus minutes, contracts and every document
related matters.
3. Will create a live G-Sec meter where all the executives will be accountable to their agendas
and they will get sufficient time and motivation for completion of their promised tasks.

fields.title: Creating new POR’s for WebOpp Team
fields.agendaCategory: Reconstructing and expansion of SWC team

fields.title: Finalizing constitution and structure of SWC and its alias.
fields.agendaCategory: Reconstructing and expansion of SWC team

fields.title: Setting up of a new lab for conducting all SWC work
fields.description: Will setup a dedicated and creative lab for various SWC activities.

fields.title: Conducting workshops and lectures for IITG students
fields.description:
1. Fresher’s have lot of interest in web development activities but not everyone can get their
desired branch so SWC will conduct various workshops and lectures to motivate them and
groom them to acquire required skill set and experience.
2. Will buy few online lectures and courses and will train them through online and offline courses.
3. Will conduct workshops like:

Python Workshop
Django Workshop
a. Basic Of Django
b. Coding ART
c. Development to Deployment
d. Database Essentials : Optimal Database design
e. Design of Website and Filtering the User Requirements
f. Optimization issues : Space vs time
